Campaign_Information.Name: Harvesta Foods
Campaign_Information.Description: Harvesta Foods is a large grocery store chain. They have been teasing a large announcment on their website. Through other sources, it has been confirmed that the announcment is about a new location that Harvesta Foods will be building a grocery store in. You have been hired by a competing grocery store chain to find out what location Harvesta Foods is most likely to purchase.

Intel01.Intel_Description: Name of projects team lead for location acquisition project: Don Draper.

Intel02.Intel_Description: Office gossip about the finance team lead blowing up at his secretary

Intel03.Intel_Description: Name of real estate contact to get EPA reports: Ben Dover

Intel04.Intel_Description: Information about what is happening with project. EPA result issues in real estate team. Seller holdout in finance team

Character03.Name: Ben Dover
Character03.Title: Real Estate Intern
Character03.Susceptability: Impersonation from projects / quid pro quo
